long_description: Inspired by Shaun White and reminescent of vintage Oakley eyewear, the Holbrook sunglasses bring style and sun protection to any activity. O Matter(R) nylon frames are lightweight, stress resistant and flexible for long-term wear. Optically correct, shatterproof and scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses enhance durability. Iridium(R) lens coating offers glare reduction. Unique 3-point fit from Oakley includes optical alignment for sharp accurate vision, impact absorption for improved safety and geometry that extends the peripheral view. Metal bolt accents on front of the frame and metal icon accents on stems. Matte black frames feature Positive Red Iridium lenses for reduced glare and true color perception in extremely bright light. Polished clear frames feature Chrome Iridium lenses for reduced glare in bright light. Oakley Holbrook sunglasses feature 6 base lens curvature for solid peripheral view and side coverage.
short_description: Inspired by Shaun White and reminescent of vintage Oakley eyewear, the Holbrook sunglasses bring style and sun protection to any activity.
